General.Name: Chifeng Jilong Gold Mining Co Ltd
General.Description: Chifeng Jilong Gold Mining Co.,Ltd. operates as a gold and non-ferrous metal mining company. It explores gold, zinc, lead, copper, and molybdenum deposits. The company is involved in the operation of gold mines; and disposal of waste electrical and electronic products. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Oriental Brothers Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Chifeng Jilong Gold Mining Co., Ltd. in December 2012. Chifeng Jilong Gold Mining Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.
